Name: A Question with Many Answers
AttributesDescription:
Ignore 20% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG to enemies inflicted with Negative Statuses.
Resonators who inflict Negative Statuses on enemies recover additional Ember, triggered once every second.
While in the Burning Waves state, Resonators deal 50% more DMG, and the Negative Status on the target is raised to max stacks upon hit.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: "Used by poets to record dreams, by playwrights to create lives, by scholars to deduce truths. What is this item that I spoke of?"
ObtainedShowDescription:
